column3: utACK. The location of the key has always bothered me.\n
Concept ACK. Verified that the keys are move-only. One nit: `jl2012-key.pgp` introduced in #7858 needs to be moved too.\n

utACK https://github.com/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/commit/fa939366910ee11e9c307d0d57eb21cdec8a362b & https://github.com/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/commit/faf4c837fba119437ddbb36d6a799dc5fd79db37

Surprised there isn't more documentation to change. One thought, could this potentially break any existing gitian build setups?

> Surprised there isn't more documentation to change. One thought, could this potentially break any existing gitian build setups?

If someone has automated the importing of gpg keys, I guess. But they'll notice soon enough.
